name: Aerial Divine Knight, Altmile
effect:
[CONT](VC):If you have no face up cards in your damage zone, all of your grade 2 units get [Power] +10000/[Shield] +5000, and if your soul has a card with "Altmile" in its card name, those units get [Critical] +1.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], call up to one grade 2 each from your deck and drop zone to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Chronodragon Nextage
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle that it attacked a grade 3 or greater vanguard, if your soul has a "Chronojet Dragon", [COST][discard two cards from your hand], retire this unit, ride a "Chronojet Dragon" from your soul as [Stand], and until end of turn, that unit gets [Power] +15000, and you cannot ride.

name: Dream-spinning Ranunculus, Ahsha
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have two or more units with "Ahsha" in their card names, this unit gets [Power] +10000. If you have three or more, it gets [Critical] +1.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire two rear-guards], and call an Ahsha's Flower Fairy token to (RC). (Ahsha's Flower Fairies are grade 0 and have an ability to become Ahsha)

name: Counteroffensive Knight, Suleiman
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one card with "Altmile" in its card name to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & return a rear-guard in another column to your hand], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Laurel Knight, Sicilus
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have no face up cards in your damage zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 card from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Smokegear Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you rode a grade 4 this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):If your vanguard is "Chronojet Dragon", when you would discard a card from hand, it may be discarded as a grade 3.

name: Steam Breath Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you discarded a card from your hand this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 card from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Cornflower Flower Maiden, Ines
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at five cards from the top of your deck, call a card from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you have another unit with the same card name as the called unit, draw a card.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When your other rear-guard is placed by your card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Valkyrie of Reclamation, Padmini
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have two or more token units, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 card from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Knight of Heavenly Spears, Agganips
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and two of your units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If your damage zone has four or more cards, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Starlight Violinist
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have no face up cards in your damage zone, all of your grade 2 units on (RC) get "Boost", and can intercept from the back row.

name: Bringer of Dreams, Belenus
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with Sentinel in your deck)

name: Steam Fighter, Balih
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Chronojet Dragon" from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not put a card into your hand, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Steam Maiden, Melem
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one "Upclutch Dragon" or "Upstream Dragon" from among them to (RC) as [Rest], shuffle your deck, and if "Upclutch Dragon" and "Upstream Dragon" are on your (VC) or (RC), [Stand] the called unit.

name: Heart Thump Worker
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with Sentinel in your deck)

name: Royal Purple Flower Maiden, Marjana
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call a card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you have another unit with the same card name as the called unit, until end of turn, this unit gets "Boost" and [Power] +10000.

name: Osmanthus Maiden, Anelma
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and call up to one Plant token to (RC). (Plants are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
[CONT](RC):If you have a rear-guard on your (RC) with the same card name as your grade 3 or greater vanguard, all of your units get "Boost".

name: Flower Garden Maiden, Mylis

effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & return a rear-guard in another column to your hand], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Starlight Violinist", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Rising Knight, Belta
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], return any number of cards with "Blaster" in their card names from your (RC) and drop zone to your deck and shuffle it. If you returned a total of three or more cards, put this unit into your soul, and draw two cards.

name: Headwind Knight, Selim
effect:
[CONT](RC):If you have no face up cards in your damage zone, this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card's abilities.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked or boosted, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and return one of your rear-guards to your hand.

effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at the top card of your deck, and call it to a (RC).

name: Upclutch Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one "Upstream Dragon" or "Steam Maiden, Melem" from among them to (RC) as [Rest], shuffle your deck, and if "Upstream Dragon" and "Steam Maiden, Melem" are on your (VC) or (RC), [Stand] the called unit.

name: Steam Maiden, Engilsa
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to one grade 4 card, ride it as [Stand], shuffle your deck, and at the end of this turn, retire that unit, and ride a grade 2 or less card from your soul or drop zone as [Rest].

name: Upstream Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one "Upclutch Dragon" or "Steam Maiden, Melem" from among them to (RC) as [Rest], shuffle your deck, and if "Upclutch Dragon" and "Steam Maiden, Melem" are on your (VC) or (RC), [Stand] the called unit.

effect: [AUTO]:When discarded from your hand during your turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Maiden of Fine Ale
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire this unit], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call up to two cards from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, one of your vanguards gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of your token units.

Draw three cards, and three of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
